recipes.name: Chocolate Mousse
ingredients: Whipped cream and chocolate shavings for serving
instructions: Melt chocolate in a heatproof bowl set over a pot of simmering water.
Remove from heat and let cool for a few minutes.
In a separate bowl, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
In another bowl, beat egg yolks and sugar until light and fluffy.
Fold the melted chocolate into the egg yolk mixture.
In a separate bowl, beat heavy cream and vanilla extract until soft peaks form.
Fold the whipped cream and beaten egg whites into the chocolate mixture.
Chill in the fridge for at least 2 hours.
Serve with whipped cream and chocolate shavings on top.

recipes.name: Pan-Seared Salmon
recipes.description: A simple and delicious way to cook salmon
instructions: Season salmon fillets with salt and black pepper.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add salmon fillets, skin-side down, and cook for 5-7 minutes, until crispy.
Flip salmon fillets and add lemon juice and garlic to the skillet.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until salmon is cooked through.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped parsley.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: A classic Russian dish made with beef and sour cream sauce
ingredients: 1 lb beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips
Egg noodles, cooked according to package instructions
instructions: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add beef and cook until browned on both sides.
Add onion, garlic, and mushrooms and cook until softened.
Sprinkle flour over the mixture and stir until combined.
Pour in beef broth and stir until the mixture thickens.
Reduce heat to low and stir in sour cream, Worcestershire sauce, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Serve over cooked egg noodles.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon and Dill
recipes.description: A light and flavorful seafood dish
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, until cooked through.
Top with lemon slices and fresh dill before serving.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Chili
recipes.description: A hearty and spicy meatless chili
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 can kidney beans, drained and rinsed
Optional toppings: shredded cheese, chopped cilantro, diced avocado
instructions: In a large pot or Dutch oven, sauté the onion, bell peppers, and garlic over medium heat until softened.
Add the black beans, kidney beans, diced tomatoes (with juice), vegetable broth, chili powder, cumin, salt, and black pepper.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 30-45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot with your favorite toppings.

recipes.name: Grilled Tuna Steaks
recipes.description: A flavorful and healthy seafood dish
instructions: Preheat grill to high heat.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and black pepper.
Brush the tuna steaks with the mixture on both sides.
Grill the tuna steaks for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked to your desired doneness.
Serve hot with your favorite side dishes.

recipes.name: Pan-Seared Salmon
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy way to enjoy salmon
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Heat olive oil in a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper, then add to skillet skin-side up.
Cook for 2-3 minutes until golden brown, then flip and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Transfer skillet to oven and bake for 8-10 minutes until cooked through.
Garnish with chopped parsley and lemon slices before serving.

recipes.name: Classic Tiramisu
recipes.description: An Italian dessert made with layers of ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese
instructions: In a medium saucepan, whisk together egg yolks and sugar until well combined.
Add milk and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens.
Remove from heat and let cool.
In a large bowl, beat heavy cream and vanilla until soft peaks form.
Fold in mascarpone cheese and cooled egg mixture.
Mix together coffee and rum in a shallow dish.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee mixture and arrange in a single layer in a 9x13 inch dish.
Spread half of the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers.
Repeat with another layer of ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Before serving, dust with cocoa powder.

recipes.name: Steak with Roasted Vegetables
recipes.description: A juicy steak served with a side of roasted vegetables
ingredients: 1 lb mixed vegetables (carrots, onions, bell peppers, zucchini)
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
Toss the mixed vegetables with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, minced garlic, dried thyme, dried rosemary, salt, and black pepper.
Place the vegetables in a baking dish and roast in the oven for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, season the steak with salt and black pepper on both sides.
Heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil in a skillet over high heat.
Add the steak and cook for 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare.
Let the steak rest for 5 minutes before slicing and serving with the roasted vegetables.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Meanwhile, brown the ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add in the chopped onion and minced garlic. Cook until softened.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Mango Salsa
recipes.description: A flavorful grilled salmon topped with fresh mango salsa
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the salmon fillets with cumin, salt, and black pepper.
Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, mix together the diced mango, red onion, red bell pepper, jalapeño pepper, lime juice, honey, and olive oil.
Serve the grilled salmon topped with the mango salsa.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Mango Salsa 2
recipes.description: A flavorful grilled salmon topped with fresh mango salsa
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the salmon fillets with cumin, salt, and black pepper.
Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, mix together the diced mango, red onion, red bell pepper, jalapeño pepper, lime juice, honey, and olive oil.
Serve the grilled salmon topped with the mango salsa.
